# harness_platform_infra_providers (Data Source)

Data source for listing Terraform/OpenTofu Providers from the IaCM Provider Registry.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "harness_platform_infra_providers" "all" {}

output "provider_count" {
  value = length(data.harness_platform_infra_providers.all.providers)
}

output "provider_types" {
  value = [for p in data.harness_platform_infra_providers.all.providers : p.type]
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `providers` (List of Object) List of providers. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--providers))

<a id="nestedatt--providers"></a>
### Nested Schema for `providers`

Read-Only:

- `account` (String) Account that owns the provider.
- `created` (Number) Timestamp when the provider was created.
- `description` (String) Description of the provider.
- `id` (String) Unique identifier of the provider.
- `type` (String) Provider type.
- `updated` (Number) Timestamp when the provider was last updated.
